GLISLIST(3G) GLISLIST(3G)

NAME

glIsList - determine if a name corresponds to a display-list

C SPECIFICATION

GLboolean glIsList( GLuint list )









PARAMETERS



  
list

  
Specifies a potential display-list name.








DESCRIPTION


glIsList returns GL_TRUE if list is the name
    of a display list and returns GL_FALSE otherwise.






ERRORS


GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if glIsList is
    executed between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding
    execution of glEnd.






SEE
  ALSO


glCallList, glCallLists, glDeleteLists,
    glGenLists, glNewList
